workApps.name: Approve Now
workApps.description: Notify managers of pending requests and allow managers to approve/reject requests from internal tools.

workApps.name: Reward
workApps.description: Send colleagues a thank you note or reward Gold for exceptional contribution.

workApps.name: Discipline
workApps.description: Send a discipline warning to subordinates for violation of codes of conduct.

workApps.name: Learning
workApps.description: View a list of mandatory, registered and suggested learning courses; check-in and send feedback for each course.

workApps.name: My Tasks
workApps.description: Manage your daily tasks and assignments.

utilityApps.name: Events
utilityApps.description: Register, check-in, check-out, send feedback to company events and programs

utilityApps.name: Survey
utilityApps.description: Conduct and collect responses for company-wide or department-wide surveys

utilityApps.name: Birthday
utilityApps.description: Your birthday is a special moment. We're very happy to send the best wishes for you. Colleagues can send you birthday wishes on myFPT.

newsApps.name: News
newsApps.description: A collection of latest news and notable events around the company

newsApps.name: Star Ave
newsApps.description: Recognise notable achievements within a business unit or within FPT

wikiApps.name: Employee Info
wikiApps.description: Basic, non-confidential employee information (name, gender, department, etc.)

gameApps.name: Game
gameApps.description: Community-engaging games with Gold as rewards
